thread.title: Kayla
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kayla

author: Kayla
title: Kayla
text: The staff at the Norwich, CT store was very professional and knowledgeable. Went over my options in great detail in an easily understandable way. My car was taken right away and ready very quickly. Will definitely be back! Great job Norwich staff and manager, Danny!
